Description: Adipurush is an upcoming mythological film, produced by T-Series and Retrophiles. The movie is written and directed by Om Raut and was concurrently filmed in Hindi and Telugu. The movie has a runtime of 2 hours and 54 minutes.

Going by the tempo and the horror movie feels that Gaslight tries to draw in the beginning, the film will remind you of Alfred Hitchcock’s Pyscho in a modern world. A paraplegic woman having the guts to explore a creepy-looking mysterious palace when it's all dark and raining outside, is something that we often justify by saying, ‘sirf filmon mein hota hain’.

The CDs get testimonies of the victims in the college, With more cases of faces being spoiled But Face Spoiler is much smarter. Somehow Avdesh gets into the hand of our Face spoiler and is about to be executed but Tushar and Mohit save him. Now with the help of Avdesh’s observational skills, Tushar’s extraordinary nose, and Mohit’s assistance, our CDs reveal the Face Spoiler in front of everyone.

Rain Basera Part 1 trailer shows a girl who sells glasses in the street, she gets attracted by a young guy, and both start loving each other. The couple was caught on camera by the local man. What happens next is the crux of the story. As per the sources, Hiral Radadiya will be seen in the second part of the series.
